law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 209, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 300, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 526, sec. 13, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1996. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V., sec. 391, effective July 13,1990. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.
